name: SupplyCompass
slogan: Empowering fashion brands to design and deliver better products, effortlessly
description:
SupplyCompass is the platform empowering fashion brands to design and deliver better products, effortlessly. Using our platform you can develop sustainable collections, get instant access to a network of trusted manufacturers, and gain complete control over production.
Our Co-Founders spent two years living and working in India to build the foundations of the company, which allowed us to develop the expertise to set a new gold standard in the industry. SupplyCompass is backed by some of Europe’s leading venture capital firms and is on an ambitious growth path to set a new gold standard. We have offices in London, Mumbai and Hyderabad, and work with brands and manufacturers globally. Our platform has been used to create millions of sustainable items, and counting.

jobs.title: ReactJS Developer
jobs.description:
ReactJS Developer

We're looking for a talented, enthusiastic ReactJS/Django(python) developer to join our team in Hyderabad and help build the backend for Supplycompass (https://www.supplycompass.com/). 

**Your role**

You will take a lead position in building the frontend services for Supplycompass platform, including:

- Work on the user focused platform software. 
- Maintaining and improving existing components of the Reactapp. 
- Developing tools and automated tests.
- Working alongside with backend-end and mobile devs to optimize API usage 
- Writing tests (TDD), debugging and improving the code quality & stability. 
- DevOps - deployment, Docker, Celery.

and more...

**Requirements**

- 3+ years developing with Javascript/ReactJS/AngualrJS
- Git for version control 
- Good verbal and written communication in English

Strong plus:

- Javascript, AWS, Angular7, Go, ReactJS
- HTML5, CSS
- Experience in leadership position close to CTO

jobs.title: Financial Manager / Financial Controller
jobs.description:
Who we are:
SupplyCompass is the design-to-delivery sourcing platform for pioneering fashion and homeware brands. We believe supply chains should be faster, more efficient and more sustainable and are enabling this change by delivering both brands and manufacturers a digital sourcing platform to work from design through to delivery. 

Using our digital sourcing platform, fashion, homeware and interiors businesses can design, discover world-class responsible supply chain partners, and manage their orders all from one platform. We work with some of the most exciting and pioneering fashion and homewares brands and manufacturers around the globe.

SupplyCompass is backed by some of Europe’s leading Venture Capital firms and on an ambitious growth path. As a business with a strong purpose, you’ll be joining a passionate and driven team at an exciting stage of the company’s growth and play a core role in delivering our ambitious goals.

We have offices in London, Mumbai and Hyderabad. This role is UK based.

TOP 100 Businesses to escape to in 2019 by Escape the City
 
You can find out more about the journey to date by listening to our Co-Founders being interviewed by Monocle - https://monocle.com/radio/shows/the-entrepreneurs/408/
 
About the role:
We are looking for an exceptional individual to be the first hire in our Finance team.  You’ll be responsible for overseeing the day to day finance operations and reporting structure. You’ll have significant exposure to and involvement with all finance-led activities - board packs, shareholder management and commercial negotiations. While you will be supported by an external accountancy firm, you will own the financial accounts and be responsible for introducing robust processes and frameworks. You should therefore be a confident self-starter who likes creating process from scratch.
 
Key responsibilities will include:
Developing budgets and financial forecasts for the company for 1-5 yrs
Owning reconciliations, invoice creation, managing accounts payables, payroll, fixed assets and expenses.
Producing quarterly reports for the management team and board
Analysing revenue growth opportunities
Designing and implementing key financial processes and controls to support a rapidly scaling business.
Produce monthly board packs, including management accounts and KPI analysis.
Management of day to day accounts and cashflows
Payroll, statutory reporting and tax work.
Lead on the automation of transactional finance tasks
Manage and analyse SaaS subscription and automate reporting.
Compile and manage R&D tax applications
Keep up to date with financial governance on behalf of the company 
Maintain relationships with relevant third parties
 
Things we are looking for:
Fully qualified accountant
2+ years post qualification Experience
Understand end-to-end finance and accounting process in a tech-driven B2B SaaS business
Be proactive in seeking solutions and implementing change
Advanced Excel skills - strong financial modeler and data manipulation
Comfortable creating and implementing process from nothing 
Love solving complex problems and thrive in a fast-paced environment
Be exceptionally diligent and detail-oriented while knowing when something is "good enough"
Be well versed with tools like Xero & Receipt Bank as well as others to make accounting run seamlessly across the organisation
Ambitious, positive, energetic and smart person
Work in a highly organised and efficient manner, with great attention to detail.
Passion/experience/knowledge of fashion and production supply chains (a bonus)
 
Why you will like us:
Opportunity to grow into the role of Head of Finance
You’ll have the autonomy to organise your own day and processes
Ambitious and friendly team 
We are a purpose lead business (and currently applying to become a BCorp)
Top 100 Businesses to escape to in 2019 by Escape the City

Company benefits: 
Collaborative environment focused on helping you achieve your work goals at the same time as developing personally. 
Clear and transparent career progression 
£600-year personal development budget ( events, courses, books)
Regular training
Company library of books 
Regular company events (Weekly Pizza and beers, Monthly Socials, Annual retreats)
Bike to work scheme 
Eco-Designed Workspace with private roof terrace for outside working in summer
